mainText:
I am a college student from China 
 
   I love advisements and media,and my specialized subject is computer and information
 
   Mr.Jobs means a idol to me ,a leader,a legend
 
   The world need Jobs,maybe God needs Jobs ,too
 
   Mr.Jobs,you have got away,but the enterprising spirit and creative mind will never die 
 
   Wish you happy in heaven,from my heart.
author: Anonymous
